metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to the Lower City- Talk to the travelers straight ahead, by the carriage.

0.speaker: Hasmet Hudd
0.text: Leave us alone, would you? We've got plenty to worry about without being stalked by undesirables.
0.context: NodeContext: Dismissive; has heard the player's a terrible person

1.speaker: Hasmet Hudd
1.text: It's bad enough having the army of the Absolute on our heels - now you're here.
1.context: NodeContext: Disapproving; has heard the player's a terrible person

2.speaker: Hasmet Hudd
2.text: Gods, we should have just kept going - this place isn't any safer than the last.

3.speaker: Hasmet Hudd
3.text: I hope you make it out of here when the Absolute arrives -sounds like you're pretty useful to have around.

4.speaker: Hasmet Hudd
4.text: With people like you around, we might not get obliterated immediately when the Absolute arrives. So, thanks.
4.context: NodeContext: Gruffly impressed by what they've heard

5.speaker: Hasmet Hudd
5.text: Don't get too comfortable - it's only a matter of time before the army of the Absolute gets here.
